A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i am a star wars fan\, and though i enjoyed Last Jedi\, i feel it was a movie made for the masses. the characters we great\, and the visuals were stunning\, but the plot had some nonsensical story arcs\, and the jokes were a bit forced and somewhat childish\, and there were alot of them. Some of the science behind why star wars feels real they threw out the window\, and the development of snoke and rey is a big let down
